item.title: ~! Vengeance help !~
item.dc:creator: @_Pure_Pwnage ~!Pure Pwnage!~
item.description:
@_Pure_Pwnage wrote:

How do i make this attack the OTHER player? right now it attacks the user STILL NOT SOLVED I NEED HELP!!!

public void veng() {
client player = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerId];
                            if(vengCount == 1) {

                                        player.hitDiff = hitDiff / 4;
                                        player.hitUpdateRequired = true;
                                        player.updateRequired = true;
                                        player.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			   vengCount = 0;

                            }
}

Read full topic
